role_description: An Ansible role that installs mitmproxy (a console interface that helps simulate MITM attacks) on macOS and Linux
role_description_full_overview: [mitmproxy](https://github.com/mitmproxy/mitmproxy) is an interactive, SSL/TLS-capable intercepting proxy with a console interface for HTTP/1, HTTP/2, and WebSockets. It also includes mitmweb which is a web-based interface for mitmproxy.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs mitmproxy (a console interface that helps simulate MITM attacks) on macOS and Linux.
